Text: To be clear: this is a 1 GB PDF file? Then I really must download that, because I don't have a GB PDF yet! (FYI, that's one-megabyte-per-page...)

has someone tried it. Is the memory running wild. From my experience, too large a pdf and windows is running wild. You put the pointer over the file and gadget cpu usage memory goes 100% and stays there even if you remove the pointer.
